fields.name: Debit note related to goods or services
fields.description: Debit information related to a transaction for goods or services to the relevant party.

fields.name: Metered services invoice
fields.description: Document/message claiming payment for the supply of metered services (e.g., gas, electricity, etc.) supplied to a fixed meter whose consumption is measured over a period of time.

fields.name: Debit note related to financial adjustments
fields.description: Document/message for providing debit information related to financial adjustments to the relevant party.

fields.name: Commercial invoice
fields.description: (1334) Document/message claiming payment for goods or services supplied under conditions agreed between seller and buyer.

fields.name: Debit note
fields.description: Document/message for providing debit information to the relevant party.

fields.name: Prepayment invoice
fields.description: An invoice to pay amounts for goods and services in advance; these amounts will be subtracted from the final invoice.

fields.name: Factored invoice
fields.description: Invoice assigned to a third party for collection.

fields.name: Consignment invoice
fields.description: Commercial invoice that covers a transaction other than one involving a sale.

fields.name: Insurer's invoice
fields.description: Document/message issued by an insurer specifying the cost of an insurance which has been effected and claiming payment therefore.

fields.name: Forwarder's invoice
fields.description: Invoice issued by a freight forwarder specifying services rendered and costs incurred and claiming payment therefore.

fields.name: Freight invoice
fields.description: Document/message issued by a transport operation specifying freight costs and charges incurred for a transport operation and stating conditions of payment.
